name: Wander in the Dark (SoPeculiarGames)
description: Wander in the Dark was created by myself and my 10-year-old son as a part of the Global Game Jam 2021. We aimed to create a cozy sensory experience that helps you relax and unwind. Levels are procedurally generated, so you can play over and over again and never lose the sense of exploring a new space.
